meanings.definition: A type of white wine made from the Riesling grape.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy sipping on rieslings during summer picnics.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant had a great selection of rieslings from different regions.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone wanted to taste the rieslings before they were all gone!
meanings.sent4: Her love for rieslings was like a sweet melody that lingered on her taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the rieslings filled the room, inviting everyone to take a sip.

meanings.definition: Plural form of Riesling, referring to multiple bottles or glasses of Riesling wine.
meanings.sent1: We bought three rieslings for the dinner party.
meanings.sent2: The cellar was stocked with various rieslings for the wine tasting event.
meanings.sent3: The rieslings on the table seemed to be having a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: The shelves were lined with rieslings, like soldiers ready for battle.
meanings.sent5: The clinking of the rieslings being poured added a festive touch to the evening.
